medical_history.chief_complaint: Painful and swollen right foot unresponsive to oral flucloxacillin.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 weeks prior to admission. The patient reported pain and swelling in the right foot that progressively worsened.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Positive HIV status; no history of claudication pain, diabetes mellitus, or ingestion of ergot-related herbal compounds.
